query:
WITH latest_plays AS (
            SELECT id, song_id
            FROM song_plays
            ORDER BY create_time DESC
            LIMIT $1
        )
        SELECT str.tag_id, COUNT(*)::bigint AS cnt
        FROM latest_plays sp JOIN song_tag_refs str ON sp.song_id = str.song_id
        GROUP BY str.tag_id
        ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT $2;
